article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15YCl57 hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: What It's Like To Write A Video Game

div.p: Modern video games are showing signs of morphing into other, still more subtle and complicated forms; among other things, they’re becoming an increasingly sophisticated vehicle for storytelling.

h2.a: Building The World's Largest Ship (In 76 Seconds)

div.p: A timelapse of the construction of Maersk Line's very first Triple-E vessel at the DSME shipyard in Okpo, Korea.

header.div: IS THIS THE ENDS OF DAYS? PROBABLY

h2.a: The Gigantic Mosquitos Sent To Destroy Humanity

div.p: Gallinippers, which go by the scientific name of Psorophora ciliata, are said to be about the size of a quarter with a painful bite that’s been described by some as getting stabbed with a knife.

header.div: WILL BE OUTDONE BY SOMEONE PLANKING

h2.a: The Mother Of All Rooftopping Photos, On Top Of The Tallest Building In The World

div.p: Famed National Geographic photographer Joe McNally managed to snap the mother of all rooftopping photos,

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yp0JHE&via=Digg&text=The Mother Of All Rooftopping Photos, On Top Of The Tallest Building In The World

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10dREVW hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Dying Vet's 'F*ck You' Letter To George Bush And Dick Cheney

div.p: You may evade justice but in our eyes you are each guilty of egregious war crimes, of plunder and, finally, of murder, including the murder of thousands of young Americans—my fellow veterans—whose future you stole.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10dREVW&via=Digg&text=Dying Vet's 'F*ck You' Letter To George Bush And Dick Cheney

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y0Pqew hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Who Is Guccifer, The Hacker Who's Terrorizing Politicos?

div.p: An Illuminati-obsessed hacker is breaking into the email accounts of Washington, D.C.'s political elite, and sharing what he finds. Who is Guccifer, and what's his motive?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y0Pqew&via=Digg&text=Who Is Guccifer, The Hacker Who's Terrorizing Politicos?

div.p: From "Shock and Awe" to the insurgency to the Surge.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-138OS8j hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Most Realistic Virtual Human Ever Is A Fully Expressive Talking Head

div.p: Hoping to be holding the personal assistant of the future, researchers at the University of Cambridge have unveiled what's supposedly the most realistically esxpressive controllable avatar ever. Move aside, Siri—this is what you get for mouthing off.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/138OS8j&via=Digg&text=The Most Realistic Virtual Human Ever Is A Fully Expressive Talking Head

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11f42HP hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: OUR BEST CHANCE TO GET THE BIG GULP BACK

h2.a: NYC Pot Decriminalization Could Happen This Week

div.p: Governor Coumo is pushing for the decriminalization of small amounts of pot in NYC, something that Mayor Bloomberg is in favor of.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11f42HP&via=Digg&text=NYC Pot Decriminalization Could Happen This Week

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YENzFR hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: A Surprisingly Large Number Of Men Catch Their Genitals In A Zipper Every Year

div.p: Zipper injuries are the single most common cause of penile injury in adult men reporting to emergency rooms.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YENzFR&via=Digg&text=A Surprisingly Large Number Of Men Catch Their Genitals In A Zipper Every Year

h2.a: What It Takes To Protect Obama On A Middle East Trip

div.p: Ex-Secret Service agent Dan Emmett talks about what it takes to keep the president safe on a trip to the Middle East, where President Obama will arrive on Wednesday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZWxvBr&via=Digg&text=What It Takes To Protect Obama On A Middle East Trip

h2.a: People Will Think Less Of You When You Show Them Your BlackBerry Z10

div.p: Are people looking down on BlackBerries, and the people who use them, as a proxy for resentment for people who are poor?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZHbirb&via=Digg&text=People Will Think Less Of You When You Show Them Your BlackBerry Z10

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-39cMot hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: WELL IF YOU HAVE TO ASK...

h2.a: Am I A Torturer?

div.p: Ben Allbright watches The Daily Show, worships Dave Eggers—and still wound up "softening up" prisoners in Iraq.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/39cMot&via=Digg&text=Am I A Torturer?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16GA93B hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: March Madness Will Cost Businesses $134M. Why Aren’t Employers Concerned?

div.p: A few decades ago, the idea that employees would be able to spend hours watching a sporting event during normal working hours would’ve been unthinkable.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16GA93B&via=Digg&text=March Madness Will Cost Businesses $134M. Why Aren’t Employers Concerned?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZbGBYR hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Iffy Science Of Measuring Calories

div.p: As you may have heard, sex doesn't burn nearly as many calories as you might have been led to believe. But this is far from the only finding in obesity research that wilts under intense scrutiny.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZbGBYR&via=Digg&text=The Iffy Science Of Measuring Calories

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XnyFV3 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How Soccer Explains Israel

div.p: Jerusalem's FC Beitar signed two Muslim players from Russia in February and — intentionally or not — stirred a national controversy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XnyFV3&via=Digg&text=How Soccer Explains Israel

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YEIBJ8 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Which Country's Banks Have The Most Power To Destroy Their Economies?

div.p: How do you find the next Cyprus, a country where the banks’ problems are imperiling the entire country’s economy?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YEIBJ8&via=Digg&text=Which Country's Banks Have The Most Power To Destroy Their Economies?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16H3qed hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Five Myths About Iraq

div.p: On the eve of the U.S. invasion of Iraq, the assumptions many Americans held about the coming war, fed by rhetoric from the George W. Bush White House, turned out to be wildly inaccurate. Today, a new set of beliefs defines many discussions about the war and its aftermath. Are they just as wrong?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16H3qed&via=Digg&text=Five Myths About Iraq

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11daeAd hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Brazilian Bikini Waxes Behind The Rise In STDs

div.p: Shaving and waxing of bikini lines could be behind an explosion in the number of cases of a type of sexually transmitted infection that causes unsightly warts, doctors are warning.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11daeAd&via=Digg&text=Brazilian Bikini Waxes Behind The Rise In STDs

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XnF829 hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: FASTER THAN THE SPEED OF SNAPCHAT

h2.a: Powerful Tornadoes Can Transport Photographs Over 200 Miles

div.p: And this is the story of how a Facebook group became the best dataset on tornado debris ever created.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XnF829&via=Digg&text=Powerful Tornadoes Can Transport Photographs Over 200 Miles

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WB2FPQ hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: MORE THAN IN A NEW YORK MINUTE

h2.a: What Happens In An Internet Minute?

div.p: 204 million emails are sent, six million Facebook pages are viewed and 1.3 million YouTube clips are downloaded.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WB2FPQ&via=Digg&text=What Happens In An Internet Minute?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-145FBgq hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Body Modification Legend Left This Final Note Before His Suicide

div.p: Body modification enthusiasts may know better than most people what it's like to be judged on sight for their piercings, tattoos, scars, and other forms of body art. For Shannon Larratt, the founder of BMEzine, this societal judgment may have cost him the final years of his life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/145FBgq&via=Digg&text=Body Modification Legend Left This Final Note Before His Suicide

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-149Dxo9 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The House Across From Westboro Baptist Is Getting A Rainbow Pride Paint Job Right Now

div.p: By the end of today, the inhabitants of the Westboro Baptist Church compound in Topeka, Kansas, should have a new view out their windows, just past their FAG MARRIAGE DOOMS NATIONS sign: a new gay-rights center across the street, painted in brilliant rainbow colors, with a pride flag flying from a 30-foot flagpole.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/149Dxo9&via=Digg&text=The House Across From Westboro Baptist Is Getting A Rainbow Pride Paint Job Right Now

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WBBmFf hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Spring Break Is Big Business

div.p: Spring break is, in the popular imagination, a time of freedom. But in actuality, spring break has become—like nearly everything else US college students do—an expensive, highly structured event that someone is making money off of.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WBBmFf&via=Digg&text=Spring Break Is Big Business

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16GHArs hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Numbers Behind America's Most Expensive Fighter Jet Ever

div.p: The F-35 Joint Strike Fighter is designed to do everythig from night stealth missions to tank destruction to vertical takeoff. Such prowess doesn't come cheap.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16GHArs&via=Digg&text=The Numbers Behind America's Most Expensive Fighter Jet Ever

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XWwIT0 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The 49ers' Plan To Build The Greatest Stadium Wi-Fi Network Of All Time

div.p: When the San Francisco 49ers' new stadium opens for the 2014 NFL season, it is quite likely to have the best publicly accessible Wi-Fi network a sports facility in this country has ever known.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XWwIT0&via=Digg&text=The 49ers' Plan To Build The Greatest Stadium Wi-Fi Network Of All Time

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YosJLv hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Bringing Iconic London To Burning Man 2013

div.p: It’s less than six months until Burning Man begins, so the large scale art installations and their creators are beginning to surface, making their needs for support known.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YosJLv&via=Digg&text=Bringing Iconic London To Burning Man 2013

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YkxWXS hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: 'Weev' Auernheimer Might Be A Jerk, But He's Not A Computer Criminal

div.p: But just because you’re a jerk doesn’t mean that you’re a criminal. And in this case, it’s not clear that Auernheimer committed any actual crime.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YkxWXS&via=Digg&text='Weev' Auernheimer Might Be A Jerk, But He's Not A Computer Criminal

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YoQ3ss hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: WE'LL EXPLAIN THIS WITH AN INFOGRAPHIC

h2.a: We've Reached Peak Infographic, And We're No Smarter for It

div.p: The original creators of the infographic were designing for an audience that couldn't read. Today, many people just don't want to.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YoQ3ss&via=Digg&text=We've Reached Peak Infographic, And We're No Smarter for It

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YmPPp0 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Malala, Pakistani Teen Shot For Demanding An Education, Heads To School

div.p: Some terrific news today: Malala Yousafzai's story has come full circle. If you remember, the Pakistani teenager was shot in the head by a Taliban gunman because she was in favor of girls receiving an education.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YmPPp0&via=Digg&text=Malala, Pakistani Teen Shot For Demanding An Education, Heads To School

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-108OB1j hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The School Tuitions Of The NCAA Bracket

div.p: Sure, winning a basketball title is worth bragging about, but we all know the real champion is the institution of higher education that can charge the most tuition and still have enough students to keep its rejection letter printer warm.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/108OB1j&via=Digg&text=The School Tuitions Of The NCAA Bracket

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WT04Df hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why All Of Your Favorite Shows Are Ratings Disasters

div.p: The new rules of the hyper-social, data-driven, actor-friendly, super-seductive platinum age of television.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WT04Df&via=Digg&text=Why All Of Your Favorite Shows Are Ratings Disasters

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XWJsv6 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Ian McKellen To Officiate Patrick Stewart’s Wedding

div.p: Fanfic writers, your dreams are coming true: Magneto is marrying Professor X.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XWJsv6&via=Digg&text=Ian McKellen To Officiate Patrick Stewart’s Wedding
